home.title: Hello, I'm Julian Maggio
home.description: Passionate about creating innovative web solutions and turning ideas into reality through code.

project1.title: AniVue
project1.description: A sleek anime streaming platform with a vast library and personalized recommendations

project2.title: ComicSphere
project2.description: A feature-rich SaaS for comic creators to host, manage, and monetize their digital  comics

project3.title: Portfolio Website
project3.description: An interactive showcase of my projects and skills, featuring smooth animations and a modern design

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out!

profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.description: Passionate about creating innovative web solutions.

summery.title: Professional Summary
summery.content: With over 5 years of experience in full stack development, I specialize in building scalable web applications using TypeScript, Next.js, and cloud technologies. I'm passionate about clean code, user-centric design, and continuous learning.

focus.title: Current Focus
focus.content: Currently, I'm focused on expanding my knowledge in AI and machine learning, particularly in their applications to web development. I'm also exploring serverless architectures and edge computing to enhance the performance and scalability of web applications.

philosophy.title: Personal Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe in continuous learning, problem-solving through creativity, and making a positive impact through technology.

faq1.question: Whats your favorite programming language?
faq1.answer: JavaScript (but I also love TypeScript and Lua).

faq2.question: What are you working on right now?
faq2.answer: I'm currently diving deeper into AI and machine learning, focusing on how they can enhance web development.

faq3.question: How can I get in touch with you?
faq3.answer: Feel free to reach out via my contact form or through LinkedIn.

aniVue.title: AniVue
aniVue.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of anime with AniVue. This cinematic portal offers a vast library of Japanese animation, featuring personalized recommendations and a sleek, user-friendly interface. Experience the future of anime streaming.

comicSphere.title: ComicSphere
comicSphere.description: Empower your comic vision with ComicSphere, a comprehensive platform for digital comic creation and distribution. From intuitive design tools to community engagement features, ComicSphere provides everything you need to bring your comic dreams to life and share them with the world.

webdemands.title: WebDemands
webdemands.description: Welcome to WebDemand, where your digital ideas transform into reality. Our platform connects visionary clients with skilled developers, ensuring your web projects are brought to life with precision and creativity. Experience the future of web development collaboration.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: You're looking at it! This interactive showcase of my work demonstrates my passion for crafting engaging digital experiences. Featuring smooth animations, responsive design, and a curated selection of my best projects, this portfolio is a testament to my skills as a web developer.

rtspackage.title: Roblox-TS Package Finder
rtspackage.description: Discover and explore packages from the @rbxts scope

work.responsibility2: Implement responsive designs and optimize application performance
work.responsibility3: Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a project in mind or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Here's how you can reach me directly

form.title: Send a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible

name.title: Name
name.error: Name must be at least 2 characters.

email.title: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address.

subject.title: Subject
subject.error: Subject must be at least 5 characters.

message.title: Message
message.error: Message must be at least 10 characters.

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you soon.

error.title: Error
error.description: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
